item.description:
Let's dance and just make it a crazy night as we party all the way down to Times Square. Details of the Bus Party Part II are posted below.
---
I am looking for the best 40 people to have fun and make it a night to remember on July 22, 2011.

$50 for guys and $30 for gals to reserve your spot on the bus plus top shelf liquor, beer, and more! No lie the bus transforms into a club on wheels and it will be one of the best nights out you've had.

Meet us at 08:30p.m. at Denny's in Southington and the bus will leave at 9p.m. sharp. We'll hit Times Square in New York City. And will return to Southington between 4 and 5a.m.

The money IS DUE ASAP before Friday July 22. You can give the money to either Christian or myself. Any questions, suggestions, want to bring a friend, etc. call/text John at 860-919-9782 or Christian at 860-357-7264. You can give your payments to us at any of our meetups and if you must then make sure you give Christian or myself the $60 before you step on the bus.

Until then live it up and have fun!

Cheers,

John
item.how_to_find_us: Call or text John at 860-919-9782 or Christian at 860-357-7264
item.name: Bus Party Part II Times Square to New York City!
